title: Meringue Cookies
ingredients: 1 c chocolate chips or crushed candy cane
instructions: Heat oven to 200°. Line baking sheet with parchment paper. In a large bowl beat the egg whites with an electric mixer on med-high speed until foamy. Add cream of tartar and continue beating until soft peaks form. Gradually add sugar, beating until stiff, glossy peaks form (1-2 min). Fold in chocolate chips. Drop dough by teaspoons, spacing them 1" apart. Bake until the meringues are dry to the touch but not browned, 1.5-2 hours. Turn oven off. Let the meringues cool in oven at least 1 hour.
